Manual Pages

Manual Pages

This GoAhead distribution provides manual pages that can be viewed (on Unix-like systems) using the systems man command. Text copies of the pages are included below:

Topic Description
goahead GoAhead web server program
gopass Utility program to manage user authorization and passwords.
webcomp Program to compile web pages into C code for serving from ROM.
